description: This Dart source file defines the 'AdminMenuManagementScreen' widget, a Flutter screen for managing the menu in an admin interface. It includes UI layout code, theme integrations, permissions checks, and widgets for displaying menu management options and placeholders.

classes.name: AdminMenuManagementScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the menu management screen for admin users, including layout, permissions check, and navigation.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A stateless widget for displaying individual menu management items with a styled container, icon, and text.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the AdminMenuManagementScreen, including header, items list, and permission-based content rendering.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget for the individual _Item in the menu management options list.
